thread.title: Christopher Lloyd on the timeless charm of 'Back to the Future' - WTAE-TV Pittsburgh
thread.title_full: Christopher Lloyd on the timeless charm of 'Back to the Future' - WTAE-TV Pittsburgh - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: WTAE-TV Pittsburgh
title: Christopher Lloyd on the timeless charm of 'Back to the Future' - WTAE-TV Pittsburgh
text:
Wednesday marks the unofficial celebration of "Back to the Future" Day, the Oct. 21, 2015, date that Marty McFly travels to in 1989's "Back to the Future Part II." To mark the occasion, check up on the stars of the blockbuster film series.
 WTAE-TV Pittsburgh.
